data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Saint Andrew that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Andrew, Guernsey

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Saint Andrew will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Saint Andrew, Guernsey a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,012 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,288 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saint Andrew, Guernsey. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Over 2 percent of the people of Saint Andrew are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Saint Andrew, Guernsey will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Andrew, Guernsey has a population of 2,300.

We estimate Saint Andrew has 1,012 people who might know Jesus, 1,242 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 46 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
